definition[0]: the person who first has the idea for something and starts it
example[0]: Professor Adams was the originator of the project.
definition[1]: someone who has an original idea, starts an activity etc
example[1]: Xerox was the originator of many innovations.
definition[2]: a financial institution that makes a loan, rather than one that buys the loan, collects interest payments on it etc
example[2]: Many banks have been large originators of business loans, but resell the loans to other lenders.
